pengu.messenger

Class PenguMessengerClient.SentMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerClient.Message
      • pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerClient.SentMessage
  • Enclosing class:
    PenguMessengerClient

    public static class PenguMessengerClient.SentMessage
extends PenguMessengerClient.Message
    This class allows for Message objects to be created so that messages can be stored in an array. It extents the Message class, to add the read, and delivered functionality. It stores additional details about a sent message:
    the read and delivery status of the sent message, and the read and delivery dates of the sent message.

        Parameterized constructor method that receives the field required for a message object, with the addition of the delivery and read: statuses and dates.
        Parameters:
        messageContent - The content of the message.
        chatID - The ID of the message's chat.
        messageTransactionDate - The transaction date of the message.
        messageID - The ID of the message.
        readStatus - The read status of the message.
        deliveredStatus - The delivery status of the message.
        readDate - The read date of the message.
        deliveredDate - The delivery date of the message.
